_header: Mary thou were greet with lovely cheer
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: To the Virgin — four monorhyming quatrains

Vercelli.First Lines:
Mari thow were greted with louely cherethoro gabriel gretyng wyth
                    chylde yow were…
Vercelli.Last Lines:
…Upon thi synful seruant laydy take hedeThat I may hawe
                    schryfte and houzelle and heuen to me mede Amen
Vercelli.Editions:
Rudolf,  Winfried,
                        ed.  
             “Middle English Texts in a Vercelli Manuscript.” 
             The Library
         Seventh Series 12 (2011): 411-22: 418.
